did.abstract: Collection includes a letter from Grayson while in Congress, to his son William John, Jr. in school in Charleston, which is completely personal and gives fatherly advice to the young student about his social life. Also includes a "Commission in Equity for the District of Beaufort," granted to Grayson in 1832 by the governor of S.C., James Hamilton, Jr.
